name: Swedish Sailing Society Award Medal
obverse: Bust of Oscar I facing right.
reverse: Neptune, wearing a robe, holds a trident and laurel. He looks out at the ocean towards a sailboat in the distance.
description: This medal was given as an award by the Royal Swedish Yacht Club.
This specimen appears to be an unlisted variant of the medal described in Ulla: The inscription on the reverse is different.
Ulla lists the main inscription on the reverse as 'FÖR UTMÄRKT FÖRTJENST'.
